attributes.action: Bring honesty and decency into politics and the corporate world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Society has got very twisted, politics has been about who the best "actor" or "actress" is. Please "get real". We need CHANGE and BIG change.. its about just dropping guard and letting people know the real story. Some may be shocked BUT honesty and decency will always win. Politics appears to be about over paying quite silly people to cover up the truth, IT IS DULL. 
GIVE US HONESY AND DECENCY :-)
